Name: Magic Axolotl
About the game: Magic Axolotl is a tiny game about draw the spells on the screen to defeat the enemies. Our little axolotl found a map with the ubication of one of the stars that fell on the lands many years ago. This star is guarded by a dark ghost cat living in the night forest. Inspired by Magic Cat Academy, Magic Axolotl takes the fun gameplay combined with more enemies. Some of these enemies have different behaviors that makes you to pay attention to see where they come from. Draw as fast as you can. Enjoy drawing the spells while you listen the beautiful music made by Vindsvept.
